verses.verse: I will <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> my <S%H4931>watch,<s%> and <S%H3320>set<s%> me <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4692>tower,<s%> and will <S%H6822>watch<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> he will <S%H1696>say<s%> unto me, and <S%H4100>what<s%> I shall <S%H7725>answer<s%> <S%H5921>when<s%> I am <S%H8433>reproved.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> me, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3789>Write<s%> the <S%H2377>vision,<s%> and make it <S%H874>plain<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3871>tables,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> he may <S%H7323>run<s%> that <S%H7121>readeth<s%> it.

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H2377>vision<s%> is <S%H5750>yet<s%> for an appointed <S%H4150>time,<s%> but at the <S%H7093>end<s%> it shall <S%H6315>speak,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3576>lie:<s%> <S%H518>though<s%> it <S%H4102>tarry,<s%> <S%H2442>wait<s%> for it; <S%H3588>because<s%> it will surely <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H935><s%> it will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H309>tarry.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> which is lifted <S%H6075>up<s%> is not <S%H3474>upright<s%> <S%H3808><s%> in him: but the <S%H6662>just<s%> shall <S%H2421>live<s%> by his <S%H530>faith.<s%>

Yea <S%H637><s%> also, <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H898>transgresseth<s%> by <S%H3196>wine,<s%> he is a <S%H3093>proud<s%> <S%H1397>man,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> keepeth at <S%H5115>home,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7337>enlargeth<s%> his <S%H5315>desire<s%> as <S%H7585>hell,<s%> and is as <S%H4194>death,<s%> and <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H7646>satisfied,<s%> but <S%H622>gathereth<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H6908>heapeth<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him <S%H3605>all<s%> people: <S%H5971><s%>

Shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H4912>parable<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him, and a <S%H4426>taunting<s%> <S%H2420>proverb<s%> against him, and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to him that <S%H7235>increaseth<s%> that which is <S%H3808>not<s%> his! how <S%H5704>long?<s%> <S%H4970><s%> and to him that <S%H3513>ladeth<s%> <S%H5921><s%> himself with thick <S%H5671>clay!<s%>

Shall they <S%H3808>not<s%> rise <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H6621>suddenly<s%> that shall <S%H5391>bite<s%> thee, and <S%H3364>awake<s%> that shall <S%H2111>vex<s%> thee, and thou shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> for <S%H4933>booties<s%> unto them?

Because <S%H3588><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> hast <S%H7997>spoiled<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H7997>spoil<s%> thee; because of <S%H120>men's<s%> <S%H4480>blood,<s%> <S%H1818><s%> and for the <S%H2555>violence<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> of the <S%H7151>city,<s%> and of <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein.

Woe <S%H1945><s%> to him that <S%H1214>coveteth<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1215>covetousness<s%> to his <S%H1004>house,<s%> that he may <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H7064>nest<s%> on <S%H4791>high,<s%> that he may be <S%H5337>delivered<s%> from the <S%H4480>power<s%> <S%H3709><s%> of <S%H7451>evil!<s%>

Thou hast <S%H3289>consulted<s%> <S%H1322>shame<s%> to thy <S%H1004>house<s%> by cutting <S%H7096>off<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and hast <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against thy <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> shall cry <S%H2199>out<s%> of the <S%H4480>wall,<s%> <S%H7023><s%> and the <S%H3714>beam<s%> out of the <S%H4480>timber<s%> <S%H6086><s%> shall <S%H6030>answer<s%> it.
Woe <S%H1945><s%> to him that <S%H1129>buildeth<s%> a <S%H5892>town<s%> with <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H3559>establisheth<s%> a <S%H7151>city<s%> by <S%H5766>iniquity!<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> is it <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H3021>labor<s%> in the <S%H1767>very<s%> <S%H784>fire,<s%> and the <S%H3816>people<s%> shall <S%H3286>weary<s%> themselves for <S%H1767>very<s%> <S%H7385>vanity?<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H853><s%> with the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> as the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H3680>cover<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto him that giveth his neighbor <S%H8248>drink,<s%> <S%H7453><s%> that <S%H5596>puttest<s%> thy <S%H2573>bottle<s%> to him, and makest him <S%H7937>drunken<s%> <S%H637>also,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> thou mayest <S%H5027>look<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> their <S%H4589>nakedness!<s%>

Thou art <S%H7646>filled<s%> with <S%H7036>shame<s%> for <S%H4480>glory:<s%> <S%H3519><s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> and let thy foreskin be <S%H6188>uncovered:<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> right <S%H3225>hand<s%> shall be <S%H5437>turned<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> thee, and shameful <S%H7022>spewing<s%> shall be <S%H5921>on<s%> thy <S%H3519>glory.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H2555>violence<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> thee, and the <S%H7701>spoil<s%> of <S%H929>beasts,<s%> which made them <S%H2865>afraid,<s%> because of <S%H120>men's<s%> <S%H4480>blood,<s%> <S%H1818><s%> and for the <S%H2555>violence<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> of the <S%H7151>city,<s%> and of <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein.

What <S%H4100><s%> <S%H3276>profiteth<s%> the graven <S%H6459>image<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H3335>maker<s%> thereof hath <S%H6458>graven<s%> it; the molten <S%H4541>image,<s%> and a <S%H3384>teacher<s%> of <S%H8267>lies,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H3335>maker<s%> of his <S%H3336>work<s%> <S%H982>trusteth<s%> <S%H5921>therein,<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H483>dumb<s%> <S%H457>idols?<s%>

Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto him that <S%H559>saith<s%> to the <S%H6086>wood,<s%> <S%H6974>Awake;<s%> to the <S%H1748>dumb<s%> <S%H68>stone,<s%> <S%H5782>Arise,<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> shall <S%H3384>teach!<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is laid <S%H8610>over<s%> with <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7307>breath<s%> at <S%H3605>all<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of it.
But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple:<s%> let <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> keep <S%H2013>silence<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> him.
